title: Blood Type Calculator
description: Predict your child's blood type based on parents' blood types
metaDescription: Free blood type calculator - Predict possible blood types of your child based on mother's and father's blood type using Punnett square genetics.

results.title: Child's Possible Blood Types
results.explanation: These results show all possible blood types your child could inherit based on parental genetics. Percentages represent the probability of each blood type.

info.title: About Blood Type Inheritance
info.description: Blood type is inherited from parents following Mendelian laws of genetics. Each parent contributes one allele (gene) that determines the child's ABO blood type and Rh factor.
info.inheritanceDescription: The ABO blood group system has four main types: A, B, AB, and O. Each person inherits one allele from each parent. Type A can be AA or AO, type B can be BB or BO, type AB is AB, and type O is OO. A and B alleles are co-dominant, while O is recessive.
info.rhDescription: The Rh factor can be positive (+) or negative (-). Rh positive is dominant over Rh negative. A person with Rh+ can have genotypes ++ or +-, while Rh- can only be --. If at least one allele is +, the blood type will be positive.
info.limitations: This calculator provides probabilities based on standard genetic laws. Actual results may vary due to rare mutations or other genetic factors. Always consult with a medical professional to determine exact blood type.
